name: Create new LionDesk contacts from PipeDrive contacts after being triggered by a custom webhook
description: Every time a custom webhook is triggered, Make will automatically create a new person in Pipedrive CRM and validate the email using ZeroBounce. If the email status is "valid" it will add the contact to LionDesk and send a Slack message. If the contact already exists in LionDesk it will send a Slack message.
